Package index

All functions

ri_collectionExists()
Test if collection exists
ri_createCollection()
Create a new IRODS collection
ri_get()
Get object from iRODS collection
ri_getCollection()
Get the default IRODS collection
ri_listDataObjects()
List data objects wihtin a collection
ri_listSubCollections()
List subcollections wihtin a collection
ri_metaAdd()
Adds meta data (AVU triple) to iRODS data object
ri_metaExists()
Check if meta data exists
ri_metaGet()
Get all meta data from an iRODS object
ri_metaRemove()
Remove meta data from an object
ri_objectExists()
Check if data objects exists
ri_put()
Store data object in iRODS collection
ri_removeCollection()
Removes a iRODS collection
ri_rm()
Delete a data object
ri_session()
Starts an R - IRODS session
ri_setCollection()
Set the default collection
ri_setDatadir()
Set the default data directory
ri_test_auth_file_exists()
ricmd test function, checks if iRODS auth file exists
ri_test_check_docker()
ricmd test function, check docker
ri_test_create_auth_file()
ricmd test function, creates dummy auth file
ri_test_create_demo_env()
ricmd test function, creates demo environment file
ri_test_get_catalog_provider_ip()
ricmd test function, get catalog provider ip
ri_test_valid_ip()
ricmd test function, test valid ip
ri_test_valid_session()
ricmd test function, creates demo environment file
